channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Same Pothole has come back again by the traffic lights, 16th September
item.description:
Have reported this before 7954276 and No Fault found, well there is a hole in the road and it's a hole in the previous bodged repairs, try doing it properly this time!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous flooding whenever it rains, 16th September
item.description:
The drain at the fence to the field next to 1 Oxford Cottages needs to be fixed. When we have rain the whole lane floods in an area of road which has already experienced loads of traffic accidents. Vehicles coming down the hill have reduced visibility so they only see another vehicle on their side of the road going the opposite direction at the last moment. This is also damaging the driveway of the property which the owners have had to fix multiple times.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A436, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog rubbish bin broken, very rusty lid., 16th September
item.description:
The dog bin at the corner of the path on Bassett rd and Gretton Road has a broken lid. It is very rusty - could be dangerous. Rest of the bin looks ok.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet
